project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis (mean, median, mode) on user-provided numerical columns from a CSV file.

task.name: Set up the project environment and CSV file loading functionality
Implement function to calculate mean for specified numerical columns
Implement function to calculate median for specified numerical columns
Implement function to calculate mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for mean, median, and mode calculation functions
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure they function correctly
